remarks: Value of the algebraic closure operation inside an associative algebra.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2015.)
statement:
aspval.a $e |- A = ( AlgSpan ` W ) $.
aspval.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
aspval.l $e |- L = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
aspval $p |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ S C_ V ) -> ( A ` S ) = |^| { t e. ( ( SubRing ` W ) i^i L ) | S C_ t } ) $.
$d L t $.
$d S t $.
$d V t $.
$d W t $.
